story_text: Molly the mouse munches on a big, juicy mango in the morning.
Max the monkey makes marvelous music with his maracas by the merry meadow.
story_images: A small, gray mouse named Molly holding a large orange mango, sitting under the morning sun.
A cheerful monkey named Max shaking maracas, surrounded by colorful flowers in a green meadow.

questions.question: What fruit does Molly the mouse munch on?
What does Max the monkey make?
